description:
Do you want your design to stand out?

Do you want to increase your skillset?

Do you want to take advantage of an ever increasing trend?

If you answered yes to any of these questions then this course is for you!

The 'Long Shadow' effect is an increasingly popular effect that can be seen in many places nowadays. From logos, application icons, web navigation menus, to posters and other print media. No matter what your target media is, the Long Shadow is a sure bet that can add depth and style to your design.

In this course we will explore two different techniques in Adobe Illustrator for creating the Long Shadow.

Technique 1 will cover creating the Long Shadow for simple paths.

Technique 2 will cover creating the Long Shadow for more complex paths.
title: Illustrator Long Shadows (2 Projects Included)
